title: This font + That font = Which font?
content:
Hypothetically speaking, What font would you get if you cross Frutiger Black with Alternate Gothic No. Two?

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/frutiger/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822000334/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/frutiger/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/frutiger/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/alternate-gothic/no-2/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822000334/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/alternate-gothic/no-2/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/alternate-gothic/no-2/")
author: MarvinMe

comments.content: Thanks jpad! I modified this post with a new better choice. Any thoughts on the cross of the two?
